text: Cookies (and other similar technologies) may collect your IP address, support security and authentication services, gather information from visitors to websites such as pages visited and how often they are visited and also enable certain features on the website.  Cookies may include "single-session cookies" which generally record information during only a single visit to our website and then are erased, and "persistent" cookies, which are generally stored on your computer or other device unless or until they are deleted or are set to expire.  We may use our own cookies or third party cookies.
